comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. create a custom map 2. add an marker itemized overlay What is the expected output? What do you see instead? markers are behind the map, instead of on top What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 4.1 Please provide any additional information below. android 4.4.2
Can you provide any additional information or a screenshot? Can you reproduce this in the OpenStreetMapViewer demo project?
